thread.title: The First Builds of Lineage OS, CyanogenMod's Successor, Are Now Live
thread.title_full: The First Builds of Lineage OS, CyanogenMod's Successor, Are Now Live

author: Eric Ravenscraft
title: The First Builds of Lineage OS, CyanogenMod's Successor, Are Now Live
text:
Go to permalink 
While CyanogenMod, the most popular custom ROM for Android , may be dead, its spirit lives on in Lineage OS . Now, the first builds of that ROM are available for the Nexus 6P, 5X, and a few other devices. CyanogenMod Is Dead, and Its Successor is Lineage OS CyanogenMod Is Dead, and Its Successor is Lineage OS CyanogenMod Is Dead, and Its Successor is Lineage… CyanogenMod was the biggest, most widely used custom Android ROM. Now, it has been discontinued,… Read more Read more 
Over the weekend, the Lineage OS team uploaded the first few builds of the new ROM. So far, it’s pretty sparse, but it includes a few devices that are popular among the custom ROM crowd: Advertisement
